title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Contextualized Project-Based Learning Design in Virtual Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the context of science projects in virtual environments and design learning strategies applicable to real-world job problem-solving.
Learners can design experiments integrating scientific theories and technological tools through PBL (Project-Based Learning) activities
Learners can improve project outcomes and produce meaningful learning results through peer assessment based on feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
